This application allows users with mobile devices to view a low-latency video stream from a remote camera and to control the camera's pan and tilt motion by moving/rotating the mobile device or by using keyboard arrow keys on a desktop or laptop.

On devices with a keyboard, you may use the Left, Right, Up or Down arrow keys to control the motion of the pan/tilt camera mount. For fine grained motion, hold down the Shift key while pressing the arrow keys. You may also use the Home or h key, 3, 9 and 6 keys to quickly orient the camera into the home position or the corresponding clock positions.

If the video stream becomes laggy or pixelated, please press the (reset) button to reset the video stream.

On mobile devices, for the motion controls to be enabled, the device must be in a landscape orientation.

You may use the or button on the camera view to toggle on/off the motion control of the camera. To grant permission for the page to access the mobile device orientation and motion events, please press the Unlock Pan & Tilt button in the center of the screen.
